GSD.impact: Steals Discord token and leveldb files, runs a suspicious EXE
GSD.notes: If you have downloaded or used the PyPi Easyfuncsys package you should rotate all Discord tokens and credentials immediately. Additionally, you should check the system for malicious binaries and other remote access tools.
GSD.description: In the PyPi Easyfuncsys package there is malicious code that appears to be stealing Discord tokens allowing it to access Discord as that user, additionally it steals leveldb files, and runs a suspicious EXE.

OSV.summary: malicious code in PyPi Easyfuncsys version all
OSV.details: In the PyPi Easyfuncsys package there is malicious code that appears to be stealing Discord tokens allowing it to access Discord as that user, additionally it steals leveldb files, and runs a suspicious EXE.
